channel.title: Luxury goods on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in Luxury goods on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 LVMH Moët Hennessy Louis Vuitton Logo
LVMH Moët Hennessy Louis Vuitton, commonly known as LVMH, is a French holding multinational corporation and conglomerate specializing in luxury goods, headquartered in Paris. The company was formed in 1987 through the merger of fashion house Louis Vuitton with Moët Hennessy, which was established after the 1971 merger between the champagne producer Moët & Chandon and the cognac producer Hennessy. In 2021 with a valuation of $329 billion, LVMH became the most valuable company in Europe.
You can download theLVMHlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: LVMH
item.description: LVMH Moët Hennessy Louis Vuitton, commonly known as LVMH, is a French holding multinational corporation and conglomerate specializing in luxury goods, headquartered in Paris. The company was formed in 1987 through the merger of fashion house Louis Vuitton with Moët Hennessy, which was established after the 1971 merger between the champagne producer Moët & Chandon and the cognac producer Hennessy. In 2021 with a valuation of $329 billion, LVMH became the most valuable company in Europe.
